thread.title: A swimming pool that is difficult to swim in
thread.title_full: A swimming pool that is difficult to swim in - Review of Hotel Oceania Paris Porte de Versailles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Z922WV
title: A swimming pool that is difficult to swim in
text: If you would like to swim, I would recommend that you ask to have the jets turned off and that they remain switched off until your swim is finished - I had a bad experience of this. Otherwise swimming in this pool is very bad for your ears.
